content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to browse a website about language learning and travel resources. The website offers resources such as Rosetta Stone, Mango Languages, and Duolingo for language learning, as well as travel guides and cultural resources. I then received a command to browse another website that offers gift ideas for language learners and travel lovers. The website also offers additional resources such as Global Road Warrior, A to Z World Travel, A to Z World Food, and Gale Database - Hospitality and Tourism. \n\nRecently, I received a command to use Google to search for "best ways to learn <language> in <destination>". The results returned links to a website that lists some of the best places to learn a language abroad, including Salatiga in Java, Indonesia for learning Indonesian, Lisbon in Portugal for learning European Portuguese, and Madrid in Spain for learning Spanish.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: []'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "analyze_code", "args": {"code": "import requests\\nfrom bs4 import BeautifulSoup\\n\\nurl = \'https://growingglobalcitizens.com/the-best-places-to-learn-a-language-abroad/\'\\n\\nresponse = requests.get(url)\\n\\nsoup = BeautifulSoup(response.content, \'html.parser\')\\n\\nlanguages = [\'Indonesian\', \'European Portuguese\', \'Brazilian Portuguese\', \'Spanish\', \'Castellano Spanish\']\\n\\ndef get_best_ways_to_learn(language, destination):\\n    query = f\'best ways to learn {language} in {destination}\'\\n    google_url = f\'https://www.google.com/search?q={query}\'\\n    response = requests.get(google_url)\\n    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.content, \'html.parser\')\\n    return soup.find_all(\'div\', class_=\'BNeawe iBp4i AP7Wnd\')\\n\\nfor language in languages:\\n    print(f\'Best ways to learn {language}:\')\\n    for destination in destinations[language]:\\n        print(f\'{destination}: {get_best_ways_to_learn(language, destination)[0].text}\')\\n    print(\'\\\\n\')\\n"}}}'}]
"""
